cause.description:
Help Stop this Tragedy.
Were Nearly to 350 people! Thats Awesome... Keep inviting! 8/12/07 500! Keep going! 9/18/07 700 awesome! 10/18/07
1. Letting Children Starve in Africa must stop.
cause.mission: Raise Awareness About African Children in Critical Hunger Conditions
cause.name: African Childrens Hunger Outreach
